title: Rockman Hoshi ni Negai wo (MegaMan: Wishing upon a Star)
synopsis: This Anime (Episode 2, to be exact), where Rockman travels from the Game-World to the real world, to learn some cultural differences about Japan, was intended to be a Special Episode for the original Mega Man Cartoon Series by Ruby-Spears, which aired around 1995 in the US.	['Hikari no Megami', 'Rockman.EXE', 'Ryuusei no Rockman', 'Irregular Hunter X: The Day of Sigma']	['Rockman', 'Light, Thomas', 'Rush', 'Wily, Albert', 'Blues', 'Roll']	['Shiina, Hekiru', 'Naka, Hiroshi', 'Takagi, Wataru', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Takano, Urara', 'Koorogi, Satomi']	[['Tanaka, Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Hata, Aki', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Capcom', ['Original Creator']], ['Noguchi, Tooru', ['Sound Effects']]]
